description:
Taxed gas oil (diesel)

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
73431 Energy tax statistics

Definition:
Gas oils (diesel) and mineral oils with corresponding
distillation characteristics that are used as motor fuels.
This refers to gas oils of subheadings 2710 19 41 to 2710 19
49 of the Combined Nomenclature.

name: Taxed gas oil (diesel)
